TREK is already a fully-functioning product you can use today and has incredible potential to scale beyond even the Sei network.

Seiview (https://seiview.xyz) is another fully-functioning project I've shipped that is used by ordinary enthusiasts and content creators alike.

Beyond Trek and Seiview, I have created multiple applications on the Sei network that have amassed over 30,000 unique users, most notable dudewheresmyca.xyz - a means for you to easily get the contract address of the last NFT you minted.

answers.answer: Trek is heavily focused on giving users a consolidated view of their assets in one place across multiple wallets. This includes tokens as well as NFTs. Trek also allows users to deep-dive and explore the market, set up sniping alerts for specific nfts or traits, enter competitions, hyperlink to marketplaces for a quick sell, and many more features.

answers.answer: Trek was built organically in January as a means of keeping tabs on where all my sei assets were. I expanded that capability so that any user could log in and see how their wider portfolio was to compared to the previous day. All other features were improved and iterated upon (and are still being iterated on today). The whole emphasis of the Trek project is positivity, allowing users to position themselves well, and gain an advantage when it comes to NFT trading.

NeoKai stands out not only for its innovative approach within the SEI ecosystem but also due to the depth of experience and dedication from our team. Our core members bring a wealth of expertise in blockchain technology, NFT development, and community building, with a track record of successful projects in the Web3 space. We are committed to transparency, user engagement, and continuous improvement, always striving to exceed the expectations of our community and partners.

NeoKai is  designed to address the real needs of the NFT community, offering an all-encompassing platform that simplifies and enhances the user experience. Our dedication to security, innovation, and user satisfaction sets us apart. We have already made significant progress with our platform, including the successful rollout of various features and strong community engagement. We believe that NeoKai is well-positioned to make a substantial positive impact on the SEI ecosystem, fostering growth, engagement, and technological advancement.

Our request for support through Gitcoin is aimed at accelerating our development and expanding our reach, ensuring that we can continue to deliver exceptional value to our users and the broader blockchain community.

answers.answer:
NeoKai creates significant value for the SEI community through a variety of innovative features and services, all designed to enhance user experience and foster engagement. Here are some specific examples:

Comprehensive Service Offering:

Staking: Users can stake their tokens to earn rewards, providing a steady income stream while contributing to the network's security and stability.
OTC Trading: Facilitates large trades without affecting market prices, offering users a secure and efficient way to conduct transactions.
Token Swaps: Simplifies the process of exchanging one cryptocurrency for another, enhancing liquidity and flexibility for users.
Raffles/Giveaways: Engages the community with exciting opportunities to win valuable NFTs and tokens, increasing user participation and retention.
Presales for Tokens and NFTs: Allows early access to new projects, giving users the chance to invest early and support innovative initiatives within the SEI ecosystem.
Lending and Borrowing: Provides users with access to liquidity through collateralized loans, enabling them to leverage their assets for various financial needs.
Enhanced User Experience:

User-Friendly Interface: Our platform is designed with ease of use in mind, ensuring that both new and experienced users can navigate and utilize all features effortlessly.
Seamless Integration: All services are integrated into a single platform, reducing the need for multiple accounts and simplifying the user experience.
Community Engagement:

Active Participation: Regular events, AMAs, and community polls keep users engaged and involved in the development process.
Incentives and Rewards: Users are rewarded for their participation and loyalty through various incentive programs, fostering a strong, engaged community.
Security and Trust:

Robust Security Measures: We prioritize the security of our users' assets and data, implementing industry-leading security practices to protect against threats.
Transparency: Regular updates and open communication ensure that the community is always informed about the latest developments and project progress.
By offering these comprehensive services and maintaining a focus on user experience, community engagement, and security, NeoKai significantly enhances the value of the SEI ecosystem, attracting more users and fostering a vibrant, thriving community.

To drive user adoption and participation, NeoKai will leverage a range of engaging initiatives and programs designed to foster a dynamic and interactive community. Here are the key initiatives we plan to employ:

Incentive Programs:

Referral Bonuses: Launching a referral program where users earn rewards by inviting others to join the platform, leveraging word-of-mouth marketing to grow our user base.
Airdrops: Distributing Senzu tokens to active users and participants in specific events, increasing their involvement and interest in the platform.
Community Events:

Raffles and Giveaways: Hosting regular raffles and giveaways to keep the community excited and engaged. Prizes will include NFTs, tokens, and exclusive access to upcoming features.
Presales for Tokens and NFTs: Offering exclusive presales for tokens and NFTs, giving users early access to valuable assets and incentivizing participation.
Contests and Challenges: Organizing fun and interactive contests and challenges that encourage users to participate in platform activities and showcase their skills.
Interactive Activities:

Community Polls and Voting: Engaging users through polls and voting on important decisions and new feature implementations, ensuring they have a voice in the platformâ€™s development.
Quizzes and Trivia Games: Running quizzes and trivia games related to blockchain, NFTs, and the SEI ecosystem, with rewards for participants to make learning fun and engaging.
Storytelling and Video Content:

NeoKai's Story: Leveraging the rich story of NeoKai, including the video content we already have, to engage users. The narrative of NeoKai, a shapeshifting character inspired by Puar from Dragon Ball Z, embarking on adventures within the SEI ecosystem, adds a unique dimension to our platform.
Progressive Storytelling: Continuing to develop and build on NeoKaiâ€™s story, creating episodic content that keeps the community hooked and looking forward to new developments.
Interactive Story Elements: Incorporating interactive elements where the community can influence the direction of NeoKaiâ€™s story through votes and participation, fostering deeper engagement.
Partnerships and Collaborations:

Strategic Partnerships: Forming alliances with other projects and influencers within the SEI ecosystem to cross-promote and drive mutual growth.
Collaborative Events: Partnering with other blockchain projects for joint events, AMAs, and campaigns to reach a wider audience and increase platform visibility.
Platform Enhancements:

User Experience Improvements: Continuously refining the user interface and experience based on community feedback to ensure the platform remains intuitive and user-friendly.
Feature Expansion: Regularly rolling out new features and tools that add value to the platform and keep users engaged.
Marketing Campaigns:

Social Media Campaigns: Leveraging social media platforms like Twitter, Discord, and Telegram to reach potential users and keep the community informed about the latest updates and events.
Content Marketing: Publishing articles, blogs, and videos to highlight the platform's features, success stories, and future plans, driving interest and engagement.
By implementing these interactive and engaging initiatives, NeoKai aims to create a vibrant, active, and loyal community that continuously grows and thrives within the SEI ecosystem.

answers.answer:
**1. Expanding User Base**

By releasing books and toys, Remos World attracts new users to the Sei blockchain, broadening its appeal beyond crypto enthusiasts to a more general audience.

**2. Fostering Community Engagement**

We build a vibrant community of collectors through social media and exclusive events, enhancing user retention and loyalty on the Sei blockchain.

**3. Encouraging Creativity**

We promote user-generated content and creativity, positioning the Sei blockchain as a hub for innovative projects and continuous community involvement.

**4. Educational Initiatives**

Our YouTube content will include educational content on blockchain and NFTs, increasing blockchain literacy and indirectly promoting the Sei blockchain.

**5. Strategic Partnerships**

We form strategic partnerships with other projects and brands, bringing new users and innovative features to the Sei blockchain, benefiting the entire ecosystem.

Remo's World enhances the Sei blockchain through user expansion, community building, cross-platform storytelling, creativity, education and strategic partnerships.

answers.answer:
**1. Onboarding Active Users**

Remos World has successfully onboarded over 300 active users from our Ethereum and Bitcoin collections, significantly increasing the user base of the Sei blockchain.

**2. Children's Book with Digital Collectibles**

We have written and illustrated a children's book that allows customers to claim a digital collectible on Sei, merging physical and digital experiences and promoting blockchain literacy.

**3. Fostering Community Spirit**

Remo's World has cultivated a strong community spirit, helping to onboard new artists and collectors to the Sei ecosystem, and enhancing engagement and participation.

1. Educational Animated YouTube Content

We are developing educational animated YouTube content aimed at young people. These videos will simplify blockchain concepts and showcase the benefits of using Sei, making it more accessible and engaging for a younger audience.

2. Children's Books and Toys with Digital Experiences

We plan to release children's books and toys that offer a seamless digital experience on Sei. Each book and toy will come with a unique digital collectible, introducing families to the Sei blockchain in a fun and interactive way.

We will host art shows and exhibitions in major cities such as Miami, Los Angeles, and London. ### Remos World Project Roadmap

**Q3 2024: Publish, Print, and Release the First Children's Book**

-   **Milestone:** Publish, print, and release the first children's book.
-   **Deliverables:**
    -   Printed copies available on Remos World store and Amazon.
    -   Digital collectibles tied to book purchases, claimable on the Sei blockchain.
-   **Use of Grant Proceeds:**
    -   **Printing and Distribution:** Cover costs for printing and distributing the book to ensure wide availability.
    -   **Marketing and Promotion:** Allocate funds for marketing campaigns to raise awareness and drive sales.
    -   **Digital Collectible Development:** Develop the digital collectible claim process on the Sei blockchain.

**Q4 2024: Create Compelling Art Collection for Art Basel 2024**

-   **Milestone:** Create a compelling art collection to showcase at Art Basel 2024.
-   **Deliverables:**
    -   Curated collection of NFTs and physical artworks.
    -   Exhibition setup and participation in Art Basel 2024.
    -   Events and workshops to engage visitors and introduce them to the Sei blockchain.
-   **Use of Grant Proceeds:**
    -   **Art Creation and Curation:** Fund the creation and curation of high-quality artworks and NFTs.
    -   **Exhibition Setup:** Cover costs for exhibition space rental, setup, and logistics.
    -   **Marketing and Promotion:** Promote the exhibition to attract attendees and media coverage.

**Q1 2025: Develop Animated YouTube Content**

-   **Milestone:** Begin work on the Remo's World animated YouTube content.
-   **Deliverables:**
    -   Initial episodes focusing on blockchain education and the Remos World universe for young audiences.
    -   Launch and promote the YouTube channel.
-   **Use of Grant Proceeds:**
    -   **Production Costs:** Hire animators, writers, and voice actors to create high-quality content.
    -   **Marketing and Advertising:** Build an audience through targeted marketing and advertising campaigns.
    -   **Equipment and Software:** Purchase necessary equipment and software for animation production.

**Proposed Timeline and Budget Allocation**

1.  **Q3 2024: Book Publishing and Release**
    
    -   **Timeline:** July - September 2024
    -   **Budget Allocation:** 35%
        -   Printing and Distribution: 20%

        -   Art Creation and Curation: 10%
        -   Exhibition Setup and Logistics: 10%
        -   Marketing and Promotion: 5%
        - 
3.  **Q1 2025: Animated YouTube Content Development**
    
    -   **Timeline:** January - March 2025
    -   **Budget Allocation:** 40%
        -   Production Costs: 20%
        -   Marketing and Advertising: 10%
        -   Equipment and Software: 10%

**Summary**

The grant proceeds will be used to publish and release our first children's book, create a compelling art collection for Art Basel 2024, and develop animated educational content for YouTube. Each milestone is strategically planned to enhance user adoption and participation in the Sei ecosystem, leveraging engaging content, educational initiatives, and high-profile events.

Frensei creates value for the SEI community in a number of ways:

No-Code Launchpad: We provide a community favourite NFT launchpad, simplifying NFT project creation and onboarding with tools like wallet checkers, allow list management, and smart-contract controls, making it accessible for all creators.

NFT Minting: Our latest feature enables artists to deploy smart contracts and mint artwork, facilitating direct monetisation and supporting a diverse creative community. Over 20 unique 1/1 artworks have been generated using this feature e.g. https://pallet.exchange/collection/born-to-die

Community Engagement Tools: We provide free tools for NFT communities such as wallet snapshots, raffle systems, and community engagement utilities, fostering an active and interconnected community.

Rarity Explorer and Indexer: Provides detailed insights into NFT collections.

We have big plans for Frensei including not least the implementation of the CW-1155 standard and with that open edition and multi-edition minting features.

Frensei is an ongoing initiative that has already made significant contributions to the SEI ecosystem which have been delivered with zero budget:

Successful Project Launches: We have successfully launched over 15 high-quality NFT projects, showcasing our platformâ€™s reliability and building trust within the SEI community.

Artist Empowerment: Our recent feature focused on artists has generated over 20 unique 1/1 artworks, providing artists with the tools to create, mint, and share their work directly on the SEI blockchain.

Free Community Tools: Frensei offers a range of free tools, including wallet snapshots, a raffle system, and community engagement utilities. Notably, our pointer tool was used to help over 25+ projects become EVM compatible on the release of Sei V2

Through these contributions, Frensei continues to drive innovation, creativity, and growth within the SEI ecosystem.

To drive user adoption and participation, Frensei will implement the following initiatives:

Tokenomics: We plan to introduce a token-based rewards system to incentivize active participation and engagement on our platform. Furthermore, we would like to lean into tokenomics as a form of payment on our platform, allowing project creators to specify tokens (coins or NFTs) which they are willing to accept as valid payments for mint.

Incubation Program: Frensei will incubate and support other builder projects and tools within the SEI ecosystem. This program will offer resources, mentorship, and platform integration to promising projects, fostering innovation and growth. By providing a supportive environment for new projects, we aim to create a thriving ecosystem of interconnected tools and services.

Partnerships and Collaborations: Frensei will actively seek partnerships with other SEI-based projects and platforms to create synergies and expand our user base. We are already exploring API-based integration with NFT marketplaces like Pallet, creating a more cohesive end to end experience for projects.

By combining tokenomics, incubation support, community engagement, strategic partnerships, and exciting events, Frensei aims to drive user adoption and participation, contributing to the growth and success of the SEI ecosystem.

answers.answer:
NFT Marketplaces and Tools

Seipex Finance significantly contributes to the Sei community by enhancing NFT marketplaces and tools. 

Our platform has released an NFT that integrates seamlessly with our suite of trading tools, providing users with exclusive access to premium features and incentivizing participation in the ecosystem. This integration promotes active engagement within the NFT marketplace, drives demand, and increases liquidity for NFT assets on the Sei network.

Web3 Content Discovery and Curation

Seipex Finance excels in web3 content discovery and curation by offering advanced scanners and market analysis tools. These tools empower users to discover valuable content and trading opportunities efficiently. Additionally, our community vetting system, facilitated through interactive chats and tight-knit communities, ensures that high-quality, trustworthy content is curated and shared. This approach enhances the overall user experience and fosters a well-informed and engaged community within the Sei network. 

Specific examples are the launches of EVM tokens like POPO & BALLZ where we were able to quickly vet and provide the community with information regarding the projects, including API's and tools to monitor market prices and portfolios before those tools were available on more common platforms.

Web Skill Sharing and Education

Seipex Finance is dedicated to web skill sharing and education by providing tools and information regarding safety around the crypto ecosystem. We focus on providing information on how to identify malicious contracts and tools through heuristics, further allowing users with little technical knowledge access to safety on Sei.

Our platform's tools are designed to be user-friendly and accessible, allowing users to learn and improve their trading skills. Through our community-driven approach, users can share knowledge, strategies, and insights, fostering a collaborative environment that supports continuous learning and skill development on the Sei network.

Our rug checkers and API services provide critical security and data access, ensuring that users can safely navigate the crypto space and access real-time information. 

Our advanced snipers and trading tools enable users to quickly capitalize on market opportunities, enhancing their profitability and efficiency. 

Additionally, our token screeners and portfolio managers offer comprehensive solutions for monitoring and managing investments, giving users detailed insights and control over their assets. 

These contributions demonstrate our commitment to enhancing safety, efficiency, and overall user experience on the Sei network.

Roadmap with Deliverables

Our current roadmap focuses on the Sei v2 EVM, aiming to develop a comprehensive Telegram trading bot system similar to popular ones like BonkBot on Solana and Sigma on Base. This system will feature essential tools such as limit orders, anti-rug mechanisms, sniping, and simulators.

Completed Milestones:

V1 token screener/rug checker, completed.
Astroport sniper completed.
DragonSwap sniper completed.
Trading code for DragonSwap completed.
Telegram bot development started, including contract scanner and portfolio scanner completed.

Upcoming Deliverables:

Expand the Telegram bot to include a full suite of trading tools for Sei on all leading DEXes as they are released.
Enhance the Telegram bot with advanced features like limit orders, anti-rug mechanisms, sniping capabilities, and built-in simulators.
Update the V2 token screener with token profiles and more data, serving as a central hub to find tokens, screen them for safety on Sei, view their distributions, and ensure investment security.

We have demonstrated our commitment to Sei and our position as first movers by successfully supporting our tooling on Seiport and DragonSwap. These efforts underscore our dedication to providing top-tier trading tools and continuously improving the trading experience on the Sei network.

Accelerated Delivery with Grant Funding
Receiving the grant will enable us to accelerate our development timeline and deliver these critical tools to the Sei community faster. 

With additional funding, we can:

Increase Development Resources: Provide monetary incentives to our developers, allowing them to dedicate more time to expedite the completion of our Telegram trading bot system and V2 token screener.

Expand Infrastructure: Invest in better infrastructure to support the scaling and performance needs of our tools, ensuring a seamless user experience. We currently maintain a cluster of over eight dedicated servers, including two Sei RPCs, two Base RPCs, one Solana RPC, and various other servers that provide infrastructure to users on Sei.

Boost Community Engagement: Enhance our community support and engagement efforts through marketing and collaborations, made possible with additional funding. We have strived to be minimally extractive to the ecosystem, maintaining transparency while maximizing our impact.

These enhancements will enable us to deliver our advanced trading tools more rapidly, enhancing safety, efficiency, and profitability for users on the Sei network.

I have developed Massdrop independently over the past six months, providing a comprehensive tool suite entirely for free. During this period, Massdrop has attracted over 10,000 unique users and received more than 50,000 visits.

Despite this success, my development and infrastructure costs are depleting my savings. To enhance Massdrop further, particularly with full SEI and EVM indexing, I need increased infrastructure investment. One key feature in development is a wallet tracker tool with Discord and web notifications, along with token and wallet analytics. Additionally, I plan to integrate DeFi tools into Massdrop, contingent on securing funding.

To support these enhancements, I intend to hire a small team of up to three developers. Their focus will be on redesigning the platform, developing and implementing the backend nodes and indexer, adding new features, and achieving full EVM compatibility.

1-Year Roadmap for Massdrop V2

Month 1-2: Planning and Initial Development

Key Milestones:
1. Project Kickoff: 
   - Define project scope and objectives.
   - Assemble development team and assign roles.
2. UI/UX Redesign:
   - Conduct user research to identify pain points and improvement areas.
   - Create wireframes and mockups for the new interface.
3. Infrastructure Setup:
   - Begin the research and setup of SEI and EVM nodes to improve uptime, speed, reliability.
4. Form a community:
   - Hire a community manager who can 

Deliverables:
- Detailed project plan and timeline.
- Initial UI/UX mockups.
- SEI and EVM node setup in progress.
- Twitter and Discord setup.

Grant Proceeds Utilization:
- Hiring UI/UX designers and developers.
- Hiring community managers and digital content creator/marketer.
- Purchasing server infrastructure for node setup.

Month 3-8: Development and Testing

Key Milestones:
1. UI/UX Implementation:
   - Develop and integrate the redesigned dApp interface.
   - Conduct usability testing and iterate based on feedback.
2. Full EVM Compatibility:
   - Integrate EVM compatibility into existing tools.
   - Conduct initial testing to ensure smooth functionality.
3. SEI and EVM Indexers Setup:
   - Implement and test SEI and EVM indexers to enhance efficiency and reliability.
4. Continued New Feature Development
   - Continue developing and releasing new tools as they are required by the community.

Deliverables:
- Redesigned dApp with improved UI/UX.
- EVM compatibility across all existing tools.
- Functional SEI and EVM indexers.

Grant Proceeds Utilization:
- Continued funding for development and testing.
- Costs associated with indexer setup and maintenance.

Month 8-11: Final Development and Integration

Key Milestones:
1. Live Wallet Tracker:
   - Develop a live wallet tracker supporting SEI and EVM addresses.
   - Integrate web and Discord notifications, address analytics, and token analytics with data from the indexers.
2. System Integration and Optimization:
   - Integrate all new features and ensure seamless operation with existing functionalities.
   - Conduct thorough testing to identify and fix any issues.
   - Integrate existing features to use the indexed data

Deliverables:
- Fully functional live wallet tracker.
- Integrated system with optimized performance.

Grant Proceeds Utilization:
- Development and integration costs.
- Testing and optimization expenses.

Month 12: Launch and Post-Launch Activities

Key Milestones:
1. Feature Launch:
   - Official launch of the redesigned dApp with new features.
   - Execute a marketing campaign to promote the new functionalities.
2. User Training and Support:
   - Provide training materials and support to users.
   - Gather user feedback for future improvements.

Deliverables:
- Successful launch of the redesigned dApp.
- Marketing materials and user training resources.

Grant Proceeds Utilization:
- Marketing and promotional activities.
- User support and feedback collection.

Utilizing Grant Proceeds

If approved, the grant proceeds will be allocated as follows:

1. Personnel Costs: Hiring skilled UI/UX designers, developers and community managers.
2. Infrastructure: Setting up SEI and EVM nodes, and indexers to ensure reliability and efficiency.
3. Development and Testing: Continuous development, integration, and rigorous testing of new features.
4. Marketing and User Engagement: Promoting the new dApp features and providing user training and support.

This roadmap ensures that Massdrop leverages the grant proceeds effectively to enhance the platform's capabilities, improve user experience, and achieve significant milestones within the proposed timeline.

With those two tools, the user has the ability to track all of his holding and sold assets, and can determine the profit or loss made. Additionally, through the market analytics, the users will have the ability to access all NFTs and Token Projects individually and gets insight into the trading of other users of this project. In addition the SEI community gets the opportunity to dive deep in project and market analytics where for example charts with active wallets, active traders or the amount of buys and sells can be analyzed. This gives them the needed information before investing in projects or checking current investments.

answers.answer:
Ideally having a testnet platform before the free mint would be nice, but does not seem reasonable. 

So initially we would plan to launch the free mint, and work on completing the marketplace for launch.

(4 - 6 weeks) / 5k - 10k
Phase one would be testnet testing and working out any issues that could arise during this stage. At this stage we would be testing our initial smart contracts, and frontend for any flaws or issues as well as getting feed back from users regarding the actual usability of the platform. This is a wide range due to the fact that most of the project development can be done by myself, however hiring a trusted dev on upwork could rapidly speed up development time and could increase the costs slightly if more developers are needed..

(2 - 4 weeks / up to 8 weeks) / 5k - 10k
Phase two would be implement those changes and get a quick round of feedback. At this stage we would also be considering looking at any audits for the smart contract and frontend / backend to see any flaws that might have been overlooked and security issues. The largest single expense at this stage would be the audits. Depending on the auditing firm, this can be an expensive part of the project.

(1 - 3 weeks) / 5k
Phase three would be to implement any additional changes needed due to the audit and final round of feedback. We would launch the marketplace and go live for buying and selling. The funding at this stage would be used all on marketing to push the awareness of the project. This might include selective influencers for popular NFTs on various chains. 


These are worst case scenarios, however also very realistic projections at the same time. The marketplace needs to be tested to ensure the safety of everyone's funds involved.

answers.answer:
Seigami is a unique NFT collection because of the art collabs that we do with other collections. Seigami takes the art of a NFT collection and "Seigamifies" it which is essentially turning the original art into an origami art style while maintaining the original look. This new collection becomes a low supply collection and is airdropped to Seigami owners and partnered collection owners. This allows two communities that had no plans in crossing paths now come together. Users who own this Seigamified collection are eligible to access Seigami holder utility tools. This incentive allows users to join the discord and create new relationships with new people in the SEI Ecosystem. 

Seigami's Growing Bank Mechanism also gives back to holders in the SEI community. The Growing Bank allows for a minimum value to be set on each Seigami NFT depending the amount in the Growing Bank. This allows users to get back a minimum SEI amount if NFT volume extremely slows down in the future.
answers.question: How does your project create value for the SEI community? Please provide specific examples.

answers.answer:
Seigami is an ongoing project that minted on March 15, 2024. During our pre-mint we released no roadmap on what our plans were as we didn't want to over promise before launching. Since launching we have: 

- Art Collaborated with SEI NFT collections
   - Seigami did a test run with the collection UOU (before they rugged, shame on them) to see how our holders and the SEI Ecosystem would react. The reactions that we received made us realize that art collabs were a perfect fit for Seigami. We then were lucky enough to art collab with Seitoshi, REMO, and DOB NFTs first sub dao NAKED YETI CLUB. Our next art collab was halted as we opened an application for a new collection where we "Seigamify" users PFP into an NFT. Unfortunately we did not proceed with the collection since we did not have enough entries from the users in the SEI Ecosystem. After this decision, SEI V2 transition was on the way so we will be continuing art collabs within the next few weeks. 

- Released 4 utility tools
   - Seigami teased 2 tools pre-mint to see how discord users would react. Our users loved our tools especially our Metadata tool which allows users to snipe the rarity of NFTs during mint. When mint day came along, those tools became holder exclusive. Since then we have released two new tools totaling of 4 utility tools for our holders (we have 5 but the mint schedule is pulled from calendart.io). Our tools include metadata, price alert, whale tracker, and sweeps monitor. These tools have helped users efficiently trade and be able to secure some rare NFTs for collectors and flippers. 

- Donated to Opal Charity
   - Jay the co-founder of Sei Labs donated his Opal #69 to be raffled off to one lucky ticket holder for Taiwan Earthquake Relief Fund. Seigami donated 275 SEI to the fund and 5 NFTs from our 4 collections (4 at the time, 5 now) to be raffled off to ticket holders. Shoutout to the Opal Team for organizing an amazing event and getting a bunch of SEI communities together.

answers.answer:
The initiatives that we plan on employing to continue user adoption and participation is our art collabs, utility tools, and our free/paid raffles (1 SEI entry fee). We also are creating a tool/app that will allow users to trade NFT's efficiently on the SEI chain (discussion of expanding to multiple chains as well) 

Our growing bank mechanism also allows users to stay "active" as they see the bank grow week by week.
answers.question: What initiatives will you employ to drive user adoption and participation? Describe any planned activities or programs.

answers.answer:
- Art Collabs
   - We will continue to provide art collabs every 2 to 3 weeks for our holders. There is no timetable on this since this will be a continuous airdrop to holders. 

- Utility Tools
   - We currently have 4 utility tools and plan to push out more depending on what holders want
   - Current plans are to release two more tools as of now which will be a Trait Listing Tool that will allow users to get notified when certain traits get listed and a Rarity Monitor tool that will notify users when a rare NFT gets listed (for example a top 10 or a top 100 NFT gets listed)

- Growing Bank Mechanism
   - Our Growing Bank is our main utility tool since it gives back to our users and allows them to always have a minimum value on the NFT. My founding partner and I have always wanted to donate personally to the Growing Bank but did not have the funds to do so as some of our royalties go back to our holders and the other portions are used to create utility tools or create our art collabs. We will use partial of the grant money to add more funding to the growing bank for our holders. 

- Mamba Trade
   - As mentioned before, Seigami is creating a whole new tool. This tool is basically a public sniper that takes on chain listings and feeds it through a live feed backed by our own in-house node which will be costly to host. This is just the start as that will be Version 1 and we will probably work towards a Marketplace if and only if things go well. Originally the team wanted to release "Seitension" which was a tool that will improve your experience trading on Pallet. This idea then turned into Mamba Trade. This sniper will take a few months to build since there will be alot of work behind a project like this. The funds from the grant, if accepted, will go towards creating this tool for the SEI Ecosystem.

### Crossover Team:
The Crossover team and network of creatives span many industries, all ready to work and build this project. From #1 charting musicians to award-winning content creators, comedians, and filmmakers, our team is equipped with a diverse range of skills and experiences. Like any good creative team, it is scalable to suit production needs and abilities and flex to whatever is required to make it happen.

### Founder / Nev:
Nev's personal experience and achievements can be found on his website [Nev's Space](https://www.nevs.space/), including links to some past companies founded and more.

Nev has been a full-time content creator for many years, with a successful career as an entrepreneur launching multiple businesses. He has built numerous online communities, amassing over 100 million views, with a significant portion being long-form 10-minute+ videos on YouTube. Some accomplishments include:

- **Founded Struthless Studios**: An animation studio that has worked on numerous web3 projects, particularly during the 2021 bull cycle.
- **Struthiverse on TikTok**: Created an animated universe that grew to 170k followers and millions of views in just three months.
- **Struthless YouTube Channel**: Built to over 1 million subscribers.
- **Step One**: Co-founded and created the brand identity for this underwear label, now a publicly listed company in Australia.
- **Early Career Achievements**: Worked as an advertising strategist winning Cannes Lions and other awards, collaborating with global brands like Gatorade, Samsung, Dyson, Shopify, Canva, Airbnb, and more.
- **Collaborations**: Worked with an extensive list of admired individuals and brands, further showcasing a versatile and impactful career.

Nev's diverse background and proven track record in both content creation and entrepreneurship make him well-suited to lead and innovate within the Crossover project. His ability to build and engage communities, coupled with his strategic thinking and creative skills, ensure that Crossover will be a pioneering force in the creator economy.

answers.question: Which of the SEI ecosystem themes does your project focus on? Please select all that apply and explain how your project contributes to each chosen theme.

answers.answer:
- **Building of SEI Characters & Lore**: Crossover features beloved SEI characters and beyond, creating lore and stories that add depth to other projects. This enriches SEI with meaningful content, acting as a cultural bridge to onboard new members.

- **Onboarding Web2 Creatives and Audiences**: By experimenting with Crossover content and processes, we aim to create a framework and platform that can onboard more creatives and audiences from traditional web environments into web3, expanding the SEI community through innovative practices.

- **Hyper-Relevant Comedy and Social Commentary**: Crossover delivers entertaining and thought-provoking content that embraces meme culture and provides social commentary. This approach allows for mass reach and breakthrough into both the wider web3 ecosystem and traditional web2 platforms, making SEI a central hub for engaging and relevant discussions.

- **Community Collaboration**: Crossover involves the SEI community in developing narratives and content, fostering ownership and engagement. By collaborating with the broader web3 ecosystem, it strengthens the community and brings in new members through joint projects.

- **Creative Tools and Learning Opportunities**: Crossover produces assets, illustrations, and animation rigs, providing these resources to individuals and other projects, pushing them into new fields. It hosts live streams for collaborative learning, empowering members with the tools and knowledge to create their own content and enhancing skill development.

- **Aiming to Utilize and Disrupt the Creator Economy**: Crossover plans to integrate traditional content creation with innovative blockchain technology, exploring new funding models and storytelling techniques. This aims to provide a comprehensive platform for creators, transforming content monetization and distribution, and attracting new talent to SEI.

### Overall Impact
Crossover aims to enhance the SEI community through engaging content, collaborative storytelling, and innovative models. By bridging web2 and web3, it seeks to attract new members, foster a vibrant community, and revolutionize the creator economy, positioning SEI as a leader in the evolving digital landscape.

### What initiatives will you employ to drive user adoption and participation? Describe any planned activities or programs.

Crossover has several exciting initiatives planned to drive user adoption and participation:

- **Collaborative Content Creation**: We will continue to collaborate with and elevate other projects, providing a great way to showcase SEI and highlight what's happening here.
- **Enhanced Content Creation**: We're exploring ways to use blockchain technology to enhance content creation and audience interaction. This includes experimenting with concepts like staking and creative collaboration specifically tailored to the creator economy.
- **Art and Story Updates**: As the story progresses, we'll roll out art updates, creating a dynamic and evolving entertainment experience.
- **Wider Web2 and Web3 Partnerships**: Building on our existing relationships, we'll engage in partnerships across both web2 and web3 ecosystems to bring SEI lore and characters to new audiences.
- **IP Licensing and Partnerships**: We plan to experiment with IP licensing and partnerships, fostering mutual growth through decentralized creativity.
- **Onboarding Platform**: Our long-term goal is to use the platform we develop through Crossover to onboard the wider creator economy into web3. By leveraging our innovative storytelling techniques, community engagement, and blockchain technology, we aim to create a comprehensive platform that helps creators and audiences transition seamlessly into the web3 ecosystem.

These initiatives are designed to push the boundaries of what's possible in the creator economy, driving both adoption and participation within the SEI community and beyond. Our overarching aim is to continually experiment with technology and creativity to innovate and elevate the creator economy, finding new ways to engage and grow our community.

**Key Milestones**:
- **Content  Creation and Experimentation**: Launch initial set of web3 content (animations, stories, live streams).
- **Community Engagement and Feedback**: Conduct live streams and community events to gather feedback.
- **Expansion into New Media Formats**: Explore spaces, podcasts, and other formats.
- **Supply SEI Projects with Tools**: Provide animation and illustration tools, such as rigs, to SEI projects and the community, helping them create their own content and achieve their goals.

**Grant Use**: Funding for content production, animation resources, live streaming equipment, marketing and outreach, community event organization, equipment, software, production costs, and providing tools to the SEI community.

### Phase 2: Collaborations and Onboarding

**Description**: This phase aims to collaborate with web2 and traditional media projects, featuring them in content to onboard their audiences. It focuses on building relationships and partnerships to bring SEI lore and characters to new places, expanding the community. Funding will be used for partnership development, collaborative content production, and outreach.

**Key Milestones**:
- **SEI Partnerships**: Collaborate with SEI projects to create joint content and onboard new audiences.
- **Web3 Partnerships**: Partner with web3 projects to expand the community beyond SEI.
- **Web2 and Beyond**: Engage with web2 and traditional media projects to bring their audiences into web3.

**Grant Use**: Funding for partnership development, content production costs, outreach and engagement, integration tools, marketing, and onboarding resources.

### Phase 3: Platform Development

**Description**: The goal of this phase is to design and develop the Crossover platform to facilitate decentralized creativity and community engagement. It includes launching a beta version to gather user feedback and refine features, followed by the official launch with full functionality and robust community features. Funding will support the design, development, testing, and promotion of the platform.

**Key Milestones**:
- **Platform Design and Development**: Create the initial design and begin development of the Crossover platform.
- **Beta Launch and Testing**: Launch beta version of the platform, including community engagement tools and blockchain integration.
- **Full Platform Launch and Growth**: Officially launch the Crossover platform, with full functionality and robust community features.

**Grant Use**: Funding for hiring developers, UI/UX designers, and project managers, continued development, beta testing, user feedback collection, final development costs, marketing and promotion, and ongoing community support.

### Timeline & Viability

The timeline for these phases is highly dependent on potential funding offers. No funding means slower and bootstrapped, funding support means speed and potential higher scalability.  Each phase is designed to progress simultaneously, with priority given to content creation and social growth, followed by collaborations and onboarding, and finally, platform development. This phased approach ensures that each area can be developed effectively, driving user adoption and participation within the SEI community and beyond.

**Phase 2+3 are mostly stretch goals via funding**: In the early stages of the project and without significant funding, the development of a comprehensive platform wouldn't be feasible. However, it is where we aim to get to. We believe we have the expertise and experience to create an innovative onboarding platform for the creator economy that isn't based on turbulent memecoins but instead on sustainable earning mechanisms for creators and audiences alike.

Our team at The Creed NFT is a group of web 3 enthusiasts a with a deep passion for the Sei network. We believe Sei has the potential to revolutionize DeFi, and that's why we're building Creed NFTs â€“ a collection of 1,000 unique Chinese warrior-knights on the Sei blockchain. But Creed NFTs are more than just beautiful collectibles; they're gateway tools designed to empower users and navigate the Sei ecosystem with confidence.

Utilities: 

Creed NFTs offer a phased development roadmap with a clear focus on utility and fostering trust within the Sei network:

â€¢The King Seer: This market analysis tool (currently in manual operation) will transition into an AI-powered dashboard, providing valuable insights for informed decision-making on Sei NFTs/defi alpha opportunities. Imagine having your own in-house market guru!

â€¢ IVSS (Identity Verification Scoring System): This creditworthiness assessment tool (under development) aims to benefit DeFi lenders by promoting trust and reducing risks within the Sei NFT and DeFi space. It will seamlessly integrate with existing DeFi platforms, making it readily accessible to Creed NFT holders.

â€¢ Secure Escrow Platform: Utilizing the IVSS, we plan to create a secure escrow system fostering trust between project founders, artists/developers, and collectors within the Sei ecosystem.

``Beyond the Collection:``

Owning a Creed NFT unlocks exclusive perks, including:

â€¢ Collaborative Art Projects:  Creed NFT holders gain the opportunity to collaborate on art projects with our talented artist.
â€¢ Game Design Discounts:   For game design enthusiasts, holding a Creed NFT might unlock potential discounts on courses for designing awesome game characters.

â€¢Seeking Your Collaboration:

We are currently at a crucial stage in development and are seeking a Gitcoin X SEI FND grant to accelerate the creation of these valuable tools. Your support will directly contribute to the growth of the Sei network by:

â€¢ Empowering NFT users with market analysis and secure transactions.
â€¢ Attracting new lenders and borrowers to the Sei DeFi ecosystem.
â€¢ Increasing loan activity and overall DeFi adoption within Sei.
â€¢ Reducing risks and fostering trust within the NFT and DeFi space on Sei.

**Investing in the Future:**

By supporting Creed NFTs, you're not just funding an NFT collection; you're investing in the future of the Sei network, fostering a secure and thriving DeFi environment for everyone. We are a dedicated team committed to making a positive impact, and your partnership in this endeavor would be invaluable.

**Conclusion:**

We believe in the power of collaboration, and your support would be a significant step forward in our mission to empower users and build a more secure and trusted Sei network. Thank you for considering our proposal. We're confident that together, we can make a real difference in the future of DeFi.

Pre-Launch Initiatives:

Our Long-Term Strategy:

â€¢ SeinergydotFi Exploration: Our vision for the future extends beyond The Creed NFTs. We plan to actively explore integrating Creed NFTs with Defi partnerships and platforms, leveraging the Identity Verification & Security System (IVSS) and secure escrow system currently under development this stage will be very important to our upcoming DeFi project, SeinergydotFi. answers.answer:
Our Roadmap:

â€¢Stage 1 (Completed): We successfully filled our OG and WL roles (85%) through strategic partnerships, giveaways, engaging games, and fostering a strong community spirit. 

â€¢Stage 2 (Ongoing): We're continuously expanding our team, nurturing community engagement, and organically growing our presence on Twitter and Discord. This stage also involves pre-mint development to establish compelling value propositions for Creed NFT holders (60% complete).

â€¢Stage 3 (Ongoing): We've finalized collaborations with exciting partners and are currently announcing them to the community (Previously Stage 4). We remain open to exploring additional strategic partnerships that benefit our community.

â€¢Stage 4 (Upcoming): The official mint date will be announced soon (To be determined). 

â€¢Stage 5 (Upcoming): Post-mint roadmap details will be unveiled, with a strong emphasis on dApp development:

    â€¢IVSS Development (Identity Verification & Security System) (30% of Grant Allocation): We'll focus on building the core technology powering the Creed NFt and subsequently,  SeinergydotFi. This system will enhance security and trust within the DeFi ecosystem by verifying user shared zero-knowledge proof identities, mitigating bad actors.
   â€¢ Secure Escrow System (20% of Grant Allocation): Developing a secure escrow system will be crucial for facilitating safe peer-to-peer transactions within our NFT marketplace and future DeFi applications.

    NFT Market Analysis & Curation Tool (10% of Grant Allocation):

 Building an NFT market analysis and curation tool will empower Creed NFT holders to make informed investment decisions and discover valuable NFT opportunities.

â€¢Stage 6 (Target): We aim to achieve a complete sell-out of the Creed collection and secure a listing on a reputable exchange. Secure holder verification will be implemented using our existing UFO bot within the server.

â€¢Stage 7 (Ongoing):Detailed roadmaps for each development area will be released, building upon the initial outlines in Stage 5. We'll showcase completed phases and continuously update our website for improvement.

â€¢Stage 8 (Future): Upon successful completion of the core dApps, we'll shift focus to the full development and launch of SeinergydotFi, the DeFi platform integrating the IVSS system. 

â€¢SeinergydotFi Development on Hold (Transparency)

The development of SeinergydotFi, initially planned as StakeSynergy, is currently paused due to unforeseen circumstances surrounding the founder of a previous affiliation. We prioritize the success of The Creed NFT project to ensure a strong foundation for the future DeFi platform. We remain committed to the long-term vision of SeinergydotFi and will resume development when possible considering we already have a whitepaper documented.

Grant Utilization:

If awarded the Gitcoin grant, the funds will be strategically allocated to accelerate our progress and achieve key milestones within the proposed timeline:

â€¢ Community Building (15%): Resources will be directed towards hosting engaging community events, rewarding active members who participate in partnership announcements, and expanding our reach through targeted marketing efforts.

â€¢ Art & Development (60%): A significant portion of the grant will compensate the creation of high-quality NFT artwork and the development of innovative dApps including the IVSS, secure escrow system, and NFT market analysis tool.

â€¢ Team Support (20%): A portion of the grant will be used to compensate and retain skilled team members who are crucial for project execution.

â€¢Marketing & Outreach (5%): We'll leverage the grant to amplify marketing efforts strategically, focusing on securing partnerships that align with our dApp development goals. 

By effectively utilizing the Gitcoin grant, we're confident in achieving our roadmap milestones efficiently and delivering a truly valuable NFT experience with long-term utility for The Creed community.

~Transparency & Communication~

 We are committed to transparent communication throughout our journey. We will regularly update the community on progress, address challenges openly, and adapt our roadmap based on valuable feedback.

Thank you for your consideration.

2. Luck Club
    * Decentralized Lottery System: By offering a permissionless, on-chain lottery, we create an engaging way for the community to interact and win rewards, using both fungible and non-fungible tokens.
    * Inclusive Raffles: Our platform supports raffles priced in any token, including v2, making it accessible to a broad audience and promoting widespread participation.
    * Community-Driven Events: Users can host their own raffles, encouraging community-driven activities and enhancing social interaction within the SEI ecosystem.
3. Katz Collection:
    * NFTs collection: The Katz collection provides unique, valuable NFTs that appeal to collectors and investors, driving demand and fostering a vibrant marketplace.
    * Collaborations and Partnerships: Through strategic partnerships and collaborations, we bring additional value and opportunities to the SEI community, expanding the ecosystem and increasing engagement.
Overall, our initiatives not only drive innovation but also enhance user engagement and promote community involvement.

* Multichain Marketing Expansion: Expand marketing efforts to reach a multichain audience, leveraging partnerships and new channels.

Use of Grant Proceeds

* Development and Testing: Allocate funds to finalize and test the beta version of Openfarm. Deploy improvements and fixes on Luck Club based on beta testing feedback and planned features.

* Security Upgrades: Invest in advanced security features to protect user assets, such as smart contract audits.
* Long-Term Programs: Fund long-term community engagement and ecosystem integration initiatives.

By following this roadmap and utilizing the grant proceeds efficiently, we aim to achieve these milestones within the proposed timeline, driving adoption and delivering value to the SEI community.

As a founder of Opals, I have lead the largest charity fundraiser on the SEI network, working with over 25 sponsors from other SEI projects and communities to raise over 8.5K SEI at the request of Jay, co-founder of SEI, for his chosen charitable intitative.  

The charity fundraiser brought together the biggest and most infuential members of the SEI ecosystem to rally together for a good cause, when positive energy was needed.  We ran a clean and transparent campaign that was fun and lively for the network, while raising money for a good cause.

As founder of Opals, I have personally recovered two stolen Opals, without loss or cost to the owner.  One was recovered after a hack on a raffle site, and the other was recovered after a former team member went rogue.  No owners incurred any loss and both Opals were secured and returned.

I believe I have demonstrated personal accountability, reliability, honesty, integrity, and the ability to be trusted and relied upon to keep my word and operate with integrity and the best interests of my holders and the SEI ecosystem in mind.  I believe I have demonstrated this not just with speech, but with verifiable action.

I have a very ambitious idea for a new token standard, one which I believe to be the next evolution of 404s and NFTs as a whole, and I have an entire ecosytem of applications already planned to compliment the new fuctionality of the token standard.

I believe this idea will change NFT's forever, and will bring substantial liquidity and attention to the network as first movers with new tech.

We were the first small collection on the SEI network 7 months ago, and also the first to use our unique method of distribution.  All 100 Opals were minted and then distributed, for free, to random giveaway winners, community members, and high value individuals.  This created the small collection and the hand-picked-holder meta.  

Many tried to duplicate our success, such as the Seiyans with The Council, and Cosmarchs, as well as others, but none have been able to duplicate our success.   We held the record for the highest NFT sale on SEI for quite some time, and have maintained the highest floor price on SEI, with volume, since inception.

We have a wholesame brand image and IP, and help with collaborative efforts for the betterment of the network, including leading the largest charity fundraiser on the network, on behalf of Jay, co-founder of SEI.  In this collaborative effort, we worked with over 25 sponsors during a time when positive PR was needed for the network, and raised over 8.5K SEI for a charitable cause.

We offer unique benefits to our holders in a market full of duplication, including our Concierge service, and acting as a collective VC Fund.

This project is an ongoing initiative. 

NFT MARKETPLACES AND TOOLS:  Our Opal Concierge Service at https://opal.vip is a hands-off, white-glove delivery service unique to the SEI ecosystem.  I have seen no tool or service like this on other networks.  We mint on behalf of our holders and airdrop them nft's to their chosen wallets via our collaborations.  This service saves the trader's valuable time, allowing them to focus on other endeavors while we work for them in the background.

CREATOR DAOs AND COLLECTIVES:  Our Opal Concierge Service is also designed with DAO applications in mind.  Holding an Opal in a DAO or treasury will fortify and increase the value of the treasury without the necessity for contract interactions.   The Concierge will airdrop NFT's and tokens from our collaborations straight to your chosen wallet or treasury with no action needed on your part. Opals are currently known to be held in: BALDAO (Seiyans), NYC DAO (Dob), and Dystopia 

DECENTRALIZED CROWDFUNDING:  We provide our holders with access to private sales typically only available to VC clients, thus allowing our holderbase to function as a collective pseudo VC fund.

YEBO
Description:
YEBO (YetiBot) is our DAO Tool which we develop with UncleCuban, the bot enables an automated DAO member List working with Discord Roles. People who have the enabled Holder role can check in to the Dao within discord with a simple /Check-in command providing their wallets and socials. If they list their NFT / sell it and lose the Discord holder role they get put into the Archive sheet, If a member who entered previously gains back their holder role the bot moves their old entry from archive back to the active member List. This enables to always have up to date Wallet lists of members who have a Holder role.
Grant Goal:
We aim to commercialize YEBO making it a one time pay Lifetime access bot for any other DAO that wants this automated system, we would love to flesh it out more â€“ couple it with an existing verification solution such as UFO or DAISY, build out a Website frontend, add other Features like raffles.

answers.answer:
Connecting Members and Projects
SeiStart is like a vibrant community hub for blockchain enthusiasts. It connects people who are working on exciting projects with those who are interested in learning about and supporting these projects.

Example: Imagine you're a blockchain developer with a new project. SeiStart helps you get noticed by others who might want to follow your progress, give feedback, or even contribute to your project.

Showcasing Influencers
SeiStart gives influencers a platform to share their knowledge and grow their audience. Influencers get their own dedicated pages where they can post updates, share insights, and interact with their followers.

Example: Your favorite crypto influencer can share their latest thoughts on DeFi, helping you stay informed while they gain more followers and build their reputation.

Easy Access to Resources
SeiStart acts as a one-stop shop for all the resources related to a project. Each project page includes important documents, articles, and tutorials, making it easy to find the information you need.

Example: If you're curious about a new NFT project, you can quickly find its whitepaper, tutorials on how to use it, and articles discussing its impact.

Incentivizing Participation
To keep the community active and engaged, SeiStart offers rewards to influencers and active users. By participating and contributing valuable content, users can earn points that can be redeemed for special perks.

Example: An influencer who regularly posts insightful updates and engages with followers might earn points that give them extra visibility or exclusive access to new features.

Random Project Discovery
SeiStart has a fun feature that lets you discover new projects randomly based on your interests. Itâ€™s like a â€œsurprise meâ€ button that helps you find new and exciting projects you might not have otherwise encountered.

Example: If you're into gaming projects, hitting the random discovery button might introduce you to a new blockchain game that's gaining traction.

Community-Driven Content
SeiStart encourages users to upload and share content, making the platform rich with user-generated information. This ensures that the content is always relevant and up-to-date.

Example: Community members can add FAQs, share how-to guides, or upload project updates, keeping the information fresh and useful for everyone.

Real-Life Examples:
For a Developer: You can list your new Sei project on SeiStart, attract followers, get feedback, and maybe even find collaborators to help you build it.

For an Influencer: You get a dedicated page to share your expertise, engage with your followers, and grow your audience, all while earning rewards for your contributions.

For a Newcomer: You can easily explore different projects, learn from the resources provided, and stay updated with the latest trends in the blockchain space.

Using tags and user activity, SeiStart will recommend projects and content tailored to each userâ€™s interests, keeping them engaged and discovering new things.

answers.question: What initiatives will you employ to drive user adoption and participation? Describe any planned activities or programs.

answers.answer:
Requirements

User Management

User Registration and Login
As a new user, I want to register an account using my wallet address, so I can access the platform.

As a registered user, I want to log in using my wallet address, so I can access my account.

User Roles
As an admin, I want to assign roles to users (Admin, Ambassador, Project Manager, Community Member), so I can manage permissions.

As a user, I want to view my role, so I know my permissions.

User Profile
As a community member, I want to manage my profile, so I can update my information and social links.

As a moderator, I want to add social links to user profiles, so they can be verified.

Project Management

Project Creation and Management
As an admin, I want to create and manage projects, so I can update project details.

As a user, I want to follow and like projects, so I can receive notifications and express interest.

Project Stages
As a project manager, I want to define project stages (LocalPrivate, Devnet, Testnet, Mainnet), so I can track project progress.

Project Details
As a user, I want to view project details (Name, Descriptions, Stage, Social Links, Tags), so I can learn about the project.

Tags and Categories
As a user, I want to filter projects by tags (e.g., AI, DeFi, Gaming), so I can find projects of interest.

Project Images
As an ambassador or admin, I want to upload images for a project, so I can visually represent the project.

Related Projects by Tag
As a user, I want to fetch a random set of projects based on a tag under a related project page, so I can explore similar projects.

Incentives and Community Engagement:
Influencer Program to attract and retain influencers

Exposure features for influencers (dedicated profile sections, featured content)

Reward system based on engagement metrics (views, likes, shares)

Notifications and Interactions

Notifications
As a user, I want to receive notifications for projects I follow, so I stay updated on project changes.

Likes and Following
As a user, I want to like and follow projects, so I can show support and receive updates.

FAQs and Resources

FAQs
As a user, I want to view FAQs for each project, so I can get answers to common questions.

Resources
As an authorized user, I want to upload resources (Title, URL) to projects, so I can share useful information.

Social Integration

Social Links
As a user, I want to view social media links for projects, so I can follow their updates on different platforms.
Infrastructure and Deployment

Technology Stack
Frontend:
Framework: Next.js 14
Styling: Tailwind CSS

Backend:
Framework: Node.js with Express or Bun
Database: PostgreSQL for relational data, Redis for caching

Authentication: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for secure authentication

Blockchain Integration:
Wallet Integration: Web3.js or Ethers.js for interaction with blockchain wallets

Hosting and Deployment:
Frontend Hosting: Vercel
Backend Hosting: AWS (EC2 for servers, S3 for storage, RDS for databases) or Heroku

CI/CD: GitHub Actions or Jenkins for continuous integration and deployment

Monitoring and Logging:
Monitoring: Prometheus with Grafana for real-time monitoring

Logging: ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) for centralized logging

Deployment Process

Development Environment Setup
Local setup for frontend, backend, and database
Integration with blockchain wallets for local testing

Staging Environment
Deploy a staging version of the application on cloud infrastructure (AWS/Heroku)

Use separate staging databases and blockchain testnets

Continuous integration setup for automatic deployment to staging on code merge

Production Environment
Deploy the application on cloud infrastructure (AWS/Heroku) with production databases and mainnet
Implement backup strategies for databases and files
Set up load balancers and auto-scaling for handling traffic

Monitoring and Maintenance
Implement real-time monitoring for performance and uptime
Set up alerts for critical issues and automatic scaling policies

Milestones
Milestone 1: Initial Setup and User Management
Duration: 2 weeks
Tasks:
Set up the database structure.
Implement user registration and login.
Implement user roles and profile management.
Setup development environment for frontend and backend.

Milestone 2: Project Management and Design
Duration: 3 weeks
Tasks:
Implement project creation and management features.
Develop functionality for defining and managing project stages.
Implement project details view with descriptions, stages, social links, and tags.
Design the user interface for project management.
Deploy to staging environment for testing.

Milestone 3: Interaction Features and Ambassador Outreach
Duration: 2 weeks
Tasks:
Implement follow and like functionalities for projects.
Develop the notifications system for project updates.
Contact and onboard ambassadors to the platform.
Populate the platform with initial projects, user profiles, and content provided by ambassadors.
Monitor staging environment and fix issues.

Milestone 4: Content Management and Image Upload
Duration: 3 weeks
Tasks:
Implement the FAQs feature.
Develop the resources upload feature for authorized users.
Implement image upload functionality for projects by ambassadors and admins.
Populate the platform with additional content and images for projects.
Prepare for production deployment.

Milestone 5: Social Integration, Related Projects, Finalization, and Launch
Duration: 2 weeks
Tasks:
Implement social media link integration for projects.
Implement the feature to fetch a random set of related projects based on a tag under a related project page.
Conduct thorough testing and bug fixing.
Set up monitoring and logging for the production environment.
Prepare documentation and user guides.
Launch the platform to the public and monitor performance.

SeiAfrica stands as a beacon of innovation and community building within the Sei blockchain ecosystem. Our previous work has laid a solid foundation for our current initiatives, showcasing our commitment to driving blockchain adoption and fostering local talent across Africa.

Previous Work and Achievements
Educational Outreach:

SeiAfrica has successfully onboarded thousands of individuals through engaging educational content, significantly increasing blockchain literacy across the continent. Our educational programs cover a range of topics from basic blockchain concepts to advanced DeFi strategies, tailored to meet the needs of diverse audiences, all geared towards wide Sei usage.
We have organized numerous webinars, workshops, and online courses, attracting participants from various backgrounds, including students, developers, and entrepreneurs.
Community Building:

Our efforts have led to the creation of a vibrant and active community of Sei blockchain enthusiasts. By providing a platform for knowledge sharing and collaboration, we have enabled community members to connect, learn, and innovate together.
We have established partnerships with local universities, tech hubs, and blockchain associations to further extend our reach and impact.
Project Development and Support:

SeiAfrica has supported the development of several blockchain projects within, providing mentorship, resources, and the platform for showcasing innovative solutions. This has not only spurred local innovation but also contributed to the overall growth of the Sei ecosystem.
Affiliations and Collaborations
Local and International Partnerships: Our collaborations with educational institutions, tech incubators, and blockchain organizations both locally and internationally have bolstered our credibility and expanded our impact. 
Industry Recognition: SeiAfricaâ€™s initiatives have been recognized by leading blockchain entities and communities within Africa , enhancing our reputation and attracting interest from potential partners and investors.
Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
SeiAfrica is dedicated to promoting diversity and inclusion within the blockchain space. By focusing on underrepresented communities, we aim to democratize access to the SEI blockchain technology and its benefits. This commitment not only supports socio-economic development but also ensures a more diverse and resilient blockchain ecosystem.

Why SeiAfrica?
Proven Track Record: Our successful educational programs and community-building efforts demonstrate our ability to drive meaningful change.
Strategic Partnerships: Our affiliations with reputable organizations strengthen our capabilities and broaden our reach.

answers.answer:
1. Launch of IDO and NFT Launchpad Platform

Objective: Introduce a platform that facilitates Initial DEX Offerings (IDOs) and NFT launches.

Key Activities:

	â€¢	Platform Development: Complete the backend and frontend development.
	â€¢	Security Audits: Conduct thorough security audit
	â€¢	Partnerships: Establish strategic partnerships with blockchain networks and key industry players.
	â€¢	Marketing Campaign: Launch a marketing campaign to create buzz and attract early adopters.
	â€¢	Community Building: Engage with the community through social media, AMAs, and events.

2. Utopia IDO

Objective: Conduct the Initial DEX Offering for Utopia, allowing users to invest in the Utopia token.

Key Activities:

	â€¢	Whitelist Registration: Open registration for whitelist participants.
	â€¢	KYC/AML Compliance: Ensure participants comply with KYC and AML requirements.
	â€¢	Marketing Push: Intensify marketing efforts to maximize participation.
	â€¢	IDO Launch: Execute the IDO event on the launchpad.
	â€¢	Post-IDO Support: Provide support to investors and address any issues post-IDO.

3. Utopia TGE (Token Generation Event)

Objective: Generate and distribute Utopia tokens to investors and stakeholders.

Timeline: Q2 2024 (immediately following the IDO)

Key Activities:

	â€¢	Token Minting: Mint Utopia tokens as per the smart contract.
	â€¢	Distribution: Distribute tokens to IDO participants and other stakeholders.
	â€¢	Liquidity Provision: Ensure liquidity on decentralized exchanges (DEXs)

4. First IDO on Utopia

Objective: Host the first third-party IDO on the Utopia platform.

Key Activities:

	â€¢	Project Selection: Select and onboard a promising project for the first IDO.
	â€¢	Due Diligence: Perform thorough due diligence and audits on the selected project.
	â€¢	Marketing: Collaborate on joint marketing efforts to promote the IDO.
	â€¢	IDO Launch: Execute the IDO on the Utopia platform.
	â€¢	Feedback Collection: Gather feedback from participants to improve future IDOs.

5. Mint of Our Portal NFTs

Objective: Mint and distribute unique NFTs associated with the Utopia platform.

Key Activities:

	â€¢	Smart Contract Development: Develop and audit the smart contracts for minting.
	â€¢	Marketing Campaign: Launch a campaign to generate interest in the NFT mint.
	â€¢	Mint Event: Conduct the minting event for the portal NFTs.

6. Revenue Share Rollout

Objective: Begin sharing revenue generated from the platform with stakeholders.

Key Activities:

	â€¢	Revenue Model Finalization: Define the revenue share model and distribution mechanics.
	â€¢	Smart Contract Deployment: Deploy and audit smart contracts for automated revenue sharing.
	â€¢	Stakeholder Communication: Inform community about the revenue share process and schedule.
	â€¢	First Payout: Execute the first revenue share payout.
	â€¢	Regular Updates: Provide regular updates on revenue generation and subsequent payouts

Sei Social Project Roadmap
Phase 1: Planning and Initial Development (Completed)
Milestone 1: Market Research and Planning
Conduct thorough market research to identify user needs and preferences.
Finalize the feature set and design specifications for Sei Social.
Deliverable: Detailed project plan and feature specification document.
Milestone 2: Initial Platform Development
Begin development of the Sei Social platform, focusing on core functionalities.
Set up development environments and infrastructure.
Deliverable: Alpha version of Sei Social with basic features.
Phase 2: Beta Launch and User Acquisition (Completed)
Milestone 3: Beta Version Release
Complete the beta version of Sei Social with enhanced features.
Conduct internal testing and debugging.
Deliverable: Beta version of Sei Social ready for initial users.
Milestone 4: User Onboarding and Incentives
Launch the incentivized onboarding program to attract early users.
Implement referral rewards and welcome bonuses.
Deliverable: Successful onboarding of the first cohort of beta users.
Phase 3: Community Engagement and Feedback Integration (Completed)
Milestone 5: Community Building and Engagement
Host webinars, AMA sessions, and virtual meetups to engage the community.
Encourage user-generated content and run content contests.
Deliverable: Active and engaged user community.
Milestone 6: Feedback Collection and Platform Improvement
Gather user feedback through surveys, polls, and direct interactions.
Prioritize and implement user-suggested improvements and features.
Deliverable: Enhanced platform based on user feedback.
Phase 4: Full Launch and Expansion (In Progress)
Milestone 7: Full Platform Launch
Finalize and launch the full version of Sei Social with all planned features.
Execute a comprehensive marketing campaign to promote the launch.
Deliverable: Official launch of Sei Social.
Milestone 8: Scaling and Strategic Partnerships
Form partnerships with influencers and other platforms within the SEI Network.
Expand user base through strategic collaborations and continued marketing efforts.
Deliverable: Expanded user base and established partnerships.

Use of Grant Proceeds
Development Costs (30% of Grant Proceeds)

Hiring Developers: Recruit additional developers to accelerate the development process.
Development Tools and Infrastructure: Invest in necessary software, development tools, and cloud infrastructure.
Marketing and User Acquisition (40% of Grant Proceeds)

Marketing Campaigns: Run targeted marketing campaigns across various platforms to attract new users.
Incentive Programs: Fund the referral rewards and welcome bonuses for new users.
Community Engagement Activities (15% of Grant Proceeds)

Event Hosting: Organize webinars, AMA sessions, and virtual meetups.
Content Contests: Provide prizes and incentives for user-generated content contests.
Feedback and Support (10% of Grant Proceeds)

Surveys and Polls: Conduct detailed surveys and polls to gather user feedback.
Support Resources: Develop and maintain a comprehensive resource library and support channels.
Miscellaneous and Contingency (5% of Grant Proceeds)

Unforeseen Expenses: Allocate a small percentage for any unforeseen expenses that may arise during the project.
By adhering to this roadmap and utilizing the grant proceeds effectively, we aim to successfully develop, launch, and expand Sei Social, thereby driving significant value and engagement within the SEI Network community.

answers.answer: We have developed a discord bot called â€œThe Degen Whale botâ€ itâ€™s the first of its kind token betting bot on Sei. Users can use $Sei/$Seiwhale to place bets on a predicted outcome of any token found on dexscreener and/or place bets on any NFT collection found on pallet exchange. This is a PVP style game embracing the degen spirt community are all about. The bot pays out 1% royalty for every game to our community vault. The funds are used to buyback $Seiwhale tokens to incentivize deflationary mechanic by removing the tokens from circulation. We have also acquired highly sought after NFT collection for holder who own a minimum of a million $Seiwhale tokens

answers.answer: We are proposing a new Dapp for this grant application while also including the possibility of upgrading our existing degen bot. The Dapp we are proposing is called â€œSei Ocean Vaultâ€ it is a lottery platform that mimics the same rules as the power ball lottery. We want to design a platform that allowed users to submit $Sei/$Seiwhale to a contract that is locked up and only released once a winner is chosen. The Dapp will provide the users with an on chain # generated in an NFT format as proof of entry. Users will be allowed to submit multiple times to increase their odds of winning. The Dapp will announce a winning numbers on a weekly basis, if a winner is not chosen the funds will remained lock in contract allowing the pool to to grow. Once a winner is chosen , they will receive 90% of the funds and Seiwhale Production gets paid the remaining 10% as royalties. The Dapp will reset the pool and entries once the money has been sent out and begin a new lottery game.  For our bot upgrade we will like to add a sport betting feature. The royalties from this will continue to be used to buyback and remove $Seiwhale tokens from circulation

answers.answer: Curvegrid is a blockchain technology company based in Tokyo, Japan. Curvegrid's MultiBaas blockchain middleware offers a web UI and a REST API, allowing developers and customers to build the blockchain without needing any prior blockchain knowledge. MultiBaas powers some of the leading blockchain applications, and our team has deep blockchain technology experience. We are occasional contributors upstream to projects like go-ethereum and solc, have been awarded multiple bug bounties by the Ethereum Foundation, and are regular mentors, judges, and sponsors at ETHGlobal hackathons.
